text: phraxngkh khux phuthrng srang phwk cea cak fun din læw cak cheux xsuci læw cak kxn leuxd læw thrng hı phwk cea khlxd xxk ma pen thark læw pheux phwk cea ca di brrlu su way chkrrc khxng phwk cea læw pheux phwk cea ca di pen khn chra læa nı hmu phwk cea mi phu seiy chiwit nı way hnum læa pheux hı phwk cea ca di brrlu su way thi thuk kahnd wi læa pheux phwk cea ca di chı stipayya khırkhrwy
